ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Cabilis faction
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks for the great info (thanks to others who posted how to raise faction too). the only hitch to this is how do you turn stuff in when you are KOS to begin
ygData.messageBody:
thanks for the great info (thanks to others who posted how to raise faction
too).

the only hitch to this is how do you turn stuff in when you are KOS to begin
with? I attempted to turn in items to the warlord on the balcony in the
lake of ill omen and as soon as I left clicked on him with the item on the
cursor I became visible as he killed me. At 170 a shot I lasted about 3
hits heh. Did I just have bad luck, did I do something wrong, or has this
generally worked for people?

thanks!
Azara Sparklemeister, 22 enchanter, Povar
- Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: refplace@... [mailto:refplace@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 10:57 AM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Cabilis faction



If the banker is Scowling Ready to Attack I don't think you can bank with
him. Especially since here are two bankers right next to each other.
Do the newbie quests as those raise all guild factions I believe.
Field of Bone hand in Scorpion Pincers
Lake of Ill Omen hand in Sarnak hatchling brains (Also can hand in those to
the Necro guild)
Warsliks Wood it is Goblin watcher torches or beads
Lake of Ill Omen it is froglok tongues.
One of the Troopers in Field of Bone near the city gate also takes 4 bone
chips.
All of these are 4 item at a time quests.

After you have done those 4 a bit and you probably need Iksar and
benevolence to turn them in, but invis might work.
Then do the cuirskin quest.
Gate a backpack full of hides off scaled wolf pups and go to the merchant
near the monk guild.
Ask to preform a small service (spell preform or perform, I forget) and get
a special pack to put the hides in then combine them and hand it back.
This I believe raises resident faction.
